name: Type Blaster
description:
Typing game done for USC Game Jam 2018. Theme: Edutainment. 

Instructions: Type the letters  left to right in order they appear on screen.

Note: VERY BUGGY prototype (Like, VERY). Will work on it again in the future, but will need to properly redesign the classes and reorganize the code first. 

Team members: Nian, Nico, & Matthew!
